Other%20Typealiases.html#/s:20IBMPushNot.name: PushNotificationsCompletionHandler
Other%20Typealiases.html#/s:20IBMPushNot.abstract: The type of callback to send with PushNotifications requests.

Other%20Enums.html#/s:20IBMPushNotificat.name: TargetPlatform
Other%20Enums.html#/s:20IBMPushNotificat.abstract: The supported platforms for receiving push notifications.

Other%20Enums.html#/s:20IBMPushNotificat.name: GcmLED
Other%20Enums.html#/s:20IBMPushNotificat.abstract: Determines the LED value in the notifications

Other%20Enums.html#/s:20IBMPushNotificat.name: ApnsType
Other%20Enums.html#/s:20IBMPushNotificat.abstract: Determines whether an alert is shown or the message is placed in the notification center.

Other%20Enums.html#/s:20IBMPushNotificat.name: FCMType
Other%20Enums.html#/s:20IBMPushNotificat.abstract: Determines whether an alert is shown or the message is placed in the notification center.

Other%20Enums.html#/s:20IBMPushNotificat.name: GcmPriority
Other%20Enums.html#/s:20IBMPushNotificat.abstract: The available priorities of the notification message.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:20I.name: ConnectionFailure
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:20I.abstract: A failure occurred when attempting to connect to the Push service.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:20I.name: InvalidNotification
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:20I.abstract: The provided Notification object contains invalid data.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:20I.name: Unauthorized
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:20I.abstract: Could not obtain authorization from the Push service.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:20I.name: NotFound
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:20I.abstract: The Push service is not available on the server.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:20I.name: ServerError
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:20I.abstract: The Push service was not able to process the request.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html.name: PushNotificationsError
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html.abstract: Used to indicate failures that may occur during IBMPushNotifications operations.

Classes/PushNotifications.html#/s:20IBMP.name: Region
Classes/PushNotifications.html#/s:20IBMP.abstract: The IBM Cloud region where the Push Notifications service is hosted.

Classes/PushNotifications.html#/s:20IBMP.name: init(pushRegion:pushAppGuid:pushAppSecret:)
Classes/PushNotifications.html#/s:20IBMP.abstract: Initialize PushNotifications by supplying the information needed to connect to the IBM Cloud Push Notifications service.

Classes/PushNotifications.html#/s:20IBMP.name: init(pushApiKey:pushAppGuid:pushRegion:)
Classes/PushNotifications.html#/s:20IBMP.abstract: Initialize PushNotifications by supplying the information needed to connect to the IBM Cloud Push Notifications service.

Classes/PushNotifications.html#/s:20IBMP.name: getAuthToken(completionHandler:)
Classes/PushNotifications.html#/s:20IBMP.abstract: This method will get an iam auth token from the server and add it to the request header. Get Auth token before calling any send methods.

Classes/PushNotifications.html.name: PushNotifications
Classes/PushNotifications.html.abstract: Used to send Push notifications via a IBM Cloud Push Notifications service.

Structs/Notification/Settings.html.name: Settings

Structs/Notification.html.name: Notification
Structs/Notification.html.abstract: The Push notification to send. Includes the notification message, the targets to receive the message, and the APNS and GCM settings.
